data.instruction: Using agents tools, create a biz representing The Unified Customer Profile (Contact 360). Use name/slug derived from saga context.
data.expectedResult: Biz is created, owner is auto-added as member with owner role, and biz id is captured.

data.instruction: Simulate customer joining waitlist/queue or prepaying for limited batch capacity.
